titles.title: Magnus White and Safe Streets for Everyone Act of 2026
Magnus White and Safe Streets for Everyone Act of 2026

To amend title 49, United States Code, to require automatic emergency braking system and similar crash avoidance technology equipped light vehicles detect and respond in a wider range of circumstances, and for other purposes.
